formattedAddress: 107 Suffolk St #307, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 107 Suffolk St #307, New York, NY 10002, USA

editorialSummary.text: Brazilian capoeira school with classes for kids, teens & adults, plus performances & events.

originalText.text: Fantastic space to train and such a welcoming and supportive community. Mestre Ombrinho and the other teachers are all extremely talented. Definitely one of the premier capoeira academies in NYC for adults or kids.

text.text: Fantastic space to train and such a welcoming and supportive community. Mestre Ombrinho and the other teachers are all extremely talented. Definitely one of the premier capoeira academies in NYC for adults or kids.

originalText.text: After years of contemplating I finally stopped by to check out this class and I'm so glad I did! Everyone here is so welcoming and encouraging. You get to work with different instructors depending on their schedules, so you get to gain different perspectives which I really enjoy! Currently I am in the core conditioning class, oh boy, 30 minutes' workout has been the best 30 minutes of any workout I ever had! I highly recommend this place for anyone who loves capoeira, martial art, or just wants a good workout! Rebecca

originalText.text: Coming here is always a pleasure.  The people are welcoming and friendly.  The teachers are very knowledgeable and encouraging.  The movements can be challenging, but they are always enjoyable. The combinations make struggle worthwhile.   Just a few weeks in, you'll notice the difference in you day-to-day movements.

text.text: Coming here is always a pleasure.  The people are welcoming and friendly.  The teachers are very knowledgeable and encouraging.  The movements can be challenging, but they are always enjoyable. The combinations make struggle worthwhile.   Just a few weeks in, you'll notice the difference in you day-to-day movements.

originalText.text: Very friendly. And everyone helps if you don't understand something.  The teachers there are very patient with children. Furthermore they go to different schools to teach this wonderful art. They have even worked with children who have disabilities.

text.text: Very friendly. And everyone helps if you don't understand something.  The teachers there are very patient with children. Furthermore they go to different schools to teach this wonderful art. They have even worked with children who have disabilities.

originalText.text: So much more than a martial arts school. Mestre Ombrinho’s academy is truly an amazing find—true to its roots, run by passionate and caring teachers, and with lots of dedicated students. It’s refreshing to see how good teachers can create high levels of achievement while not being intimidating or egotistical at all. This is a great place to visit whether you’re new to capoeira or have a couple of years of training and are interested in participating in a really well organized program.
